-| diffsw(s1, wss(c2, c1))
-| diffsc(s1, ctopon)

body.origin: |- diffsc(s1, ctopon)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2))), wn(wss(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

-| diffsc(s1, c0)

-| diffsc(s1, c2)

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s1, wss(c2, c1))
-| diffsc(s1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, crest, c2), cconn), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wi(w3a(wne(cin(cv(s0), c2), emptycls), wne(cin(cv(s1), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdif(c1, c2))), wn(wss(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

comment: Two equivalent ways of saying that a subspace topology is connected. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 9-Jul-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
